pageContext.claim: “When you see ‘anonymous source,’ stop reading the story, it is fiction!”
pageContext.analysis: Trump White House staff frequently speak to reporters on the condition of anonymity. Trump has a long history of being an anonymous source for reporters. He tweeted about an article based on anonymous sources on the same day. The article in the Daily Caller said China had hacked into Hillary Clinton's emails, but the FBI took the rare step of {denying} this claim after Trump's tweet.
